feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX2D][Hosted Private Cloud] - Equipment maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 1, 04:30 - 10:30 UTC

Sep 13, 14:55 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 01/10/2024 04:30 UTC
End time : 01/10/2024 10:30 UTC
Service impact : You may experience micro cuts during maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU/CA][VMware Private Cloud] - vRealize Operations (vRops) upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 30, 07:00 UTC  -  Oct 4, 15:00 UTC

Sep 17, 22:49 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 30/09/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 04/10/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : vRops will be unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for vRealize Operations (vRops).

entry.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - VMware vCenter Server + Hosts upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 30, 07:00 UTC  -  Oct 4, 15:00 UTC

Sep 17, 17:33 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 30/09/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 04/10/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion).
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 19, 09:00 - 14:00 UTC

Sep 17, 08:53 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 19/09/2024 09:00 UTC
End time : 19/09/2024 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Veeam Enterprise service will be unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade Storage Servers BSD.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [ERI][Hosted Private Cloud] - Incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 16, 13:39 UTC
Investigating - Our ERI Datacenter have been evacuated based on suspicions of explosive risks related to the nearby plant oil refinery.
There is no direct impact to services delivered to our clients. However scheduled maintenance are being delayed.
More information is present by clicking on this link.
